plot: Viewers visit Bob Burns' ranch; Tyrone Power and his mother dedicate a plaque to the memory of his father, Tyrone Power Sr., at the Hollywood Bowl; Edgar Bergen and Charlie McCarthy leave ...
title: Screen Snapshots Series 18, No. 2
